title: "Unable to create dump files; error 183"
body: I'm sick and absolutely tired of losing lp from have this error. Every single time it seems like when I am first pick or when it comes to my pick, it seems, that this error would just show up, crash my game and timer would run out which it seems like I queue dodged. I do see other ppl creating discussion about this so I know I'm not the only one that have this problem. Do something about this Riot because this is fucking annoying.

replies.body: This dump file error happens when the client crashes and the typical Bugsplat should pop up giving you an error message, but then the bugsplat crashes as well and you're left with this weird dump file issue. The best first step in fixing this up is to run a repair through the client options to make sure all of the game files are still intact.
